Title: Beverly Hills Cop II
Writer: Danilo Bach (characters), Daniel Petrie Jr. (characters), Eddie Murphy (story), Robert D. Wachs (story), Larry Ferguson (screenplay), Warren Skaaren (screenplay)
Actors: Eddie Murphy, Judge Reinhold, Jürgen Prochnow, Ronny Cox
Plot: Axel Foley returns to Beverly Hills to help Taggart and Rosewood investigate Chief Bogomil's near-fatal shooting and the series of "alphabet crimes" associated with it.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 2 nominations.
